name: C/4HANA Consultant (SAP Marketing, Sales and Service Cloud)
description:
As a member of CUSTOMER SUPPORT, you’ll use your technological know-how and impeccable personal skills to help customers achieve a higher level of success.

Customer Support team provides ongoing technology support and services to the world’s largest companies running SAP solutions. They follow-up post sales, ensure customer satisfaction, advise on product performance and maintenance issues, and more.

This is a wow-worthy opportunity to use cutting edge technology and a great chance to see the world’s best businesses IT operations.

Ready for a job on technology’s cutting edge? Get more about the opening below and use your chance to become a part of great team!

EXPECTATIONS AND TASKS:

As a C/4HANA services delivery consultant, you will analyze business processes of international customers and present the results of your findings and recommendations to IT managers and executives. It includes technical & infrastructure analysis as well as architecture support of Customer projects.

For this role we are looking for passionate people with excellent technical and communication skills. Since we provide services at our customer sites, business travel will be an essential part of this role.

  • Architect appropriate solution strategies through the analysis and understanding of business requirements
  • Assess concepts and systems by finding scalable and future proven solution approaches in the standard solution, with workarounds or custom developments where needed
  • Advise customers, partners and colleagues in technical topics with focus on extensibility, e.g. Kyma, SAP Cloud Application Studio (PDI/SDK) or SAP Cloud Platform, performance optimization, data migration, analytics, Adobe Lifecycle Designer & telephony/groupware integration etc
  • Develop and maintain a deep expert knowledge in the areas of C/4HANA, along with new emerging technologies and additions to the SAP solution portfolio
  • Deliver optimization and adoption services to customers, partners or internal stakeholders

Regular (>50%) short-term (1 week) business trips (Europe, CIS, Middle East, South Africa)

EDUCATION AND QUALIFICATIONS / SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES:

You are the right person for this job if you bring in the following:

  • BS, MS university degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Physics, Maths, Engineering
  • Hands-on implementation experience of SAP Cloud Application Studio (PDI/SDK), SAP Cloud Platform, Fiori or Kyma
  • Hands on experience in one or more C/4HANA solution, e.g. SAP Sales, Service or Marketing Cloud
  • Proven capabilities in performance optimization of different SAP C/4HANA cloud solutions
  • Good to have: Experience in hybrid landscape and extensibility scenarios (on-Premise and cloud)
  • Complex business software implementation experience
  • Customer goal and solution oriented, technology knowledgeable, eager to learn
  • Fast learner with analytic thinking and problem solving capabilities
  • Ability to handle multiple projects

English: Upper Intermediate, both written and verbal, with a willingness to pick up the phone when email isn’t getting the job done

WORK EXPERIENCE:

  • 3+ years of experience in consulting, analysis, implementation or support of SAP C/4HANA solution, e.g. SAP Sales, Service or Marketing Cloud

EXPECTED TRAVEL: up to 50%

WHAT YOU GET FROM US

  • You will work with innovative solutions such as SAP HANA, Mobile, Cloud solutions and more;
  • You expand your horizons by communicating with international colleagues and clients;
  • You will be a part of professional and dynamic team with a great learning & career opportunity (in Russia and abroad);

And in addition:

  • Our Saint-Petersburg office has a wonderful location in the city center right near Isaak Cathedral.
  • We have a broad benefits program: medical insurance, lunch allowance, fitness and wellbeing programs and many more.
